headline: Union Pacific has hired bankers for a possible railroad bid
summary: Executives and insiders have speculated for months that a Trump presidency could usher in a fresh wave of rail consolidation.

headline: BNSF, UP settle dispute over Salt Lake City intermodal service
summary: BNSF Railway and Union Pacific came to an agreement on routing of intermodal trains ahead of a meeting with regulators. The post BNSF, UP settle dispute over Salt Lake City intermodal service appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Union Pacific Corporation Announces 3% Dividend Increase for Third Quarter 2025
summary: OMAHA, Neb., July 16, 2025--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) announced that its Board of Directors today voted to increase the quarterly dividend on the Company’s common shares by 3% to $1.38 per share. The dividend is payable September 30, 2025, to shareholders of record August 29, 2025. Union Pacific has paid dividends on its common stock for 126 consecutive years.

headline: Union Pacific Raises Quarterly Dividend by 3%
summary: By Kelly Cloonan Union Pacific said it raised its quarterly dividend 3% to $1.38 a share. The new payout, equal to $5.52 a year, represents an annual yield of about 2.4% based on Wednesday's...
